name: Gilad Sherry-Musafi
summary: Senior Director of Engineering with extensive experience in software development, system architecture, and technical leadership. Proficient in managing cross-functional teams and pioneering complex multi-cloud and big-data system integrations.
work_history: Overjet: Senior Director of Engineering (March 2024 - November 2024), Director Of Engineering (July 2021 - March 2024). Qlik: Senior Engineering Manager (October 2019 - June 2021). Attunity: Director, Software Architect (August 2017 - October 2019), Senior Software Architect (July 2015 - August 2017), Engineering Manager - Infrastructure Team (July 2013 - June 2015), Server Software Engineer (January 2011 - July 2013), Configuration Management / DevOps Engineer (September 2006 - March 2010). IDF - Israel Defense Forces: Technical Instructor - Basmach (March 2005 - August 2006), Senior IT Network Manager (August 2003 - March 2005).
project_history: Led the design and development of new features for early adopters at Attunity. Developed a unified infrastructure for internal and public product RESTful APIs in C, C#, and Java. Initiated and developed a home-grown code generation system in Python, generating code in multiple languages.
skills: Software Development, System Architecture, Technical Leadership, Multi-cloud and Big-data System Integrations, RESTful API Development, Code Generation, Configuration Management, C, C#, Java, Python, JavaScript, Microsoft Azure, AWS, Google Cloud Platform.
education: The Academic College of Tel-Aviv, Yaffo: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science (2011 - 2015)
